meanings.definition: In a disgusting or repulsive manner.
meanings.sent1: She looked at the slimy bug ickily.
meanings.sent2: The garbage smelled ickily in the hot sun.
meanings.sent3: He made an ickily funny face when trying the strange food.
meanings.sent4: The idea of eating snails seemed ickily adventurous to her.
meanings.sent5: The sticky mud clung to her shoes ickily as she walked through the swamp.

meanings.definition: Causing a feeling of disgust or revulsion.
meanings.sent1: The ickily gooey substance made her cringe.
meanings.sent2: The spoiled milk had an ickily sour taste.
meanings.sent3: The ickily colored socks clashed with his outfit.
meanings.sent4: The abandoned house had an ickily eerie atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The ickily sticky tape trapped the spider in place.
